title: Let’s Swap
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Y-, You-chan, I tried wearing it…. How do I look?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ooh~, it looks great! My eyes didn’t deceive me after all! Ayumu-chan, I think the Ura-High’s uniform really fits you~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>This is the first time I’ve tried wearing another school’s uniform…. But Ura-High’s uniform is cute so to be told that makes me kind of happy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha. That’s right, you don’t really get much chance to wear another school’s uniform huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>You-chan, wouldn’t you also try Nijigaku’s uniform? Ah, that’s if you’re fine with wearing mine….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eeh!? Can I!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I think it will absolutely fit you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Then, let’s swap and take pictures together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That’s a good idea! I want to take a lot of pictures!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Alright! I’ll go get changed!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
